Document.Focus: Anesthesia - what to ask your doctor - child

Synonyms.Synonym: What to ask your doctor about anesthesia - child

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Anesthesia - what to ask your doctor - child ?
QAPair.Answer: Your child is scheduled to have a surgery or procedure. You will need to talk with your child's doctor about the type of anesthesia that will be best for your child. Below are some questions you may want to ask.
